description: You stand at the entrance to a tiny underground village of ...  White
animals?  You can basically see across the whole village from here.  Little
white creatures with floppy ears and red noses and little curly tails wiggle
about.  They dance continuously.
104.name: Entrance to MoogleTown

description: Smurfy Road
Delicious {7K{3u{7po {3Nuts{0 grow here.  You could probably eat a year's
worth of {7K{3u{7po {3nuts{0 in one sitting.  The main road is back to the
west and the {@grove{0 continues north.
116.name: Kupo Nut Grove

description: Smurfberry Patch
Smurfy Road
A {%b{Wl{%o{Ws{%s{Wo{%m{Wi{%n{Wg {rcherry {xtree stands here seemingly shorter than the
rest.  A small {yg{*i{yr{*l{x leans against it's {yt{gr{yu{gn{yk{x sleeping {Bp{We{Ba{Wc{Be{Wf{Bu{Wl{Bl{Wy{x...
To the south you hear the faint {*s{6o{*u{6n{*d{x of {Rl{Ya{Ru{Yg{Rh{Yt{Re{Yr{x and even more faint
the sound of running {Cw{Ba{Wt{Be{Cr...
141.name: Fields of the Cherry Blossoms

description: A set of wooden stairs to the north marks the entrance to Deneir's
Office.  The office is perched on two foot high posts set on rock
foundations.  The roof is irimoya style (gabled and hipped).  It has
long low eaves and is large relative to the size of the building.
Sliding doors lead north.  There is a small area to the side where
several pairs have been left.  It seems like the appropriate custom is
to leave one's shoes here.
135.name: Deneir's Office Entrance

description: You are now at the exit to the caves.  Ahead of you is a dark and gloomy
trail.  The trail as well seems to have had very little use, for it is
overgrown with weeds and shows no signs of any footprints.  The surrounding
woods can only be seen in about a 5' radius where it then becomes too dark
and thickly grown in by shrubs and trees.  The overgrown trail starts to the
north.
126.name: Exiting the Underground

description: Outside Gargamel's Castle
Smurfy Road
What a silly moogle...  There's nothing here!  Why was it so protective
over its cubby hole?  All you see is dust and some old wrappers from food.
Sheesh, moogles can be complicated.
133.name: Moogle's Cubby Hole

description: This section of the cave looks like a hurricane hit it!  The walls
are smashed in here and there, and the floor is cracked and splintered
everywhere as if someone took a mallet and swung around wildly.  To
the north you can hear BLARING music and the south leads back to the
main road.
130.name: Dimly Lit Passage

description: You stad before an cave entrance which is badly worn and frequently
traversed.  The faint music heard before is now getting stronger to the
north.  The path back to the road lies to the south.
103.name: Entrance to a Cave

description: You have entered what seems to be a potion lab.  Books and papers litter
the floor and bookshelves here.  A picture of a cute little moogle with
spectacles is plastered to the wall here.  And of course, there is this
music box in here, BLARING out some kick arse tunes.  There are no other
exits in this room, other than the way you came - south.
119.name: Moogle Lab

description: Smurfy Road
This is Gargamel's Castle.  His big black kettle is in the middle of the room.
Where else would he put it?  The place has only one room.
128.name: Free Room no more you cheap leveling bastards

description: A feeling of well being flows thru your body as you enter this room.
You are surrounded by a rainbow of colors in this miniature garden, brimming
with flowering trees and bushes.  A clear stream flows under a quaint wooden
bridge that seemss centuries old.  A leaf from a cherry blossom tree brushes
your cheek and you are in balance with the world around you.
139.name: Deneir's Garden

description: You have reached a large {yc{gl{*e{ga{yr{gi{*n{gg{x.  A {ybrown{x basket lies here on the
ground as well as a few {cc{Yr{cu{Ym{cb{Ys{x scattered here and there.  {BS{Wo{Ym{We{Bo{Wn{Ye{x must
have just left the area.  This open {*s{Yp{*a{Yc{*e{x is meant for {yp{Yi{gc{*n{gi{Yc{ys{x and
{Br{We{Bl{Wa{Bx{Wa{Bt{Wi{Bo{Wn{x.  A strange {5b{6u{5g{x goes flying by narrowly missing your
{rn{yo{rs{ye{x...
142.name: Fields of the Cherry Blossoms

description: You enter from a {*s{ye{*c{yr{*e{yt{x door to the south and are immediatley taken
aback by the {Bb{Ce{Wau{Ct{By{x of such a place...  To the right there is a short
{ys{gw{*i{gn{yg{x hanging from a taller {rb{yr{ra{yn{rc{yh{x of a {rcherry{x tree.  To the left is a
small {Cp{*o{Cn{*d{x with {YGold{x and {rRuby{x colored fish {xswimming about.  Straight
ahead you see the {%b{Wl{%o{Ws{%s{Wo{%m{Ws{x from the surrounding {rcherry{x trees hanging
in {Cm{Wi{Yd a{Wi{Cr{x.  You are in complete {Ba{Yw{Ce{x of this magical place and
remember the {rp{ba{yi{*n{*t{yi{bn{rg{x you saw earlier.  What could have happened to
the the artist who could capture such a {Bw{Yo{Wnd{Ye{Br{x on canvas...  {yB{ri{yr{rd{ys{x and
{Yi{gn{ys{*e{yc{gt{Ys{x fly happily around and you feel at {Cp{We{Ya{Wc{Ce{x with everything.
147.name: Fields of the Cherry Blossoms

description: A dirt pathway splits into various directions here.  To the north you can
make out what appears to be a Japanese style house.  To the south is a field
of cherry blossom trees, and to the east is back to the bridge.  It looks
like there is a strange set of stables to the west.
136.name: Crossroads

description: You have now left the small town of Moogles behind you and are traveling
inside an old cave which seems to get very little use.  The gravel on the
ground looks like it has been untouched by anyone for a long time.  Not to
mention the numerous {7cob{8webs{0 that cover the passageway here as well.
115.name: In a Cave Tunnel

description: Path to Gargamel's Castle
Smurfy Road
This section of the road is badly worn and frequently traversed.  There
is faint music to the north, and some occasional chirps.  The path back to
the road lies to the south.
102.name: Dimly Lit Path

description: The path continues toward the village.
The dimly lit path.
The walls are decorated with large paper fans resting on mounts.
The fans have various images painted on them.  In one corner in a
small alcove rests two katanas on a stand.  A kotatsu burner is set
into the floor and a table draped with quilts is placed over it.  The
floor here is covered with tatami mats.  There are several zabutons
(cushions) on the floor surrounding the low table.  To the east is
what appears to be a Japanese-style garden.  There are sliding doors
on the west and south exists.
134.name: Deneir's Office

description: You are on a dark and gloomy trail.  The trail seems to have had very
little use, for it is overgrown with weeds and shows no signs of any
footprints.  The surrounding woods can only be seen in about a 5' radius
where it then becomes too dark and thickly grown in by shrubs and trees.
Just when you thought the trail did not continue, you notice a small
{3wooden{0 door to the west covered with vines and overgrown weeds.
127.name: Along a Forgotten Trail

description: Path to Gargamel's Castle
Yet another part of the Moogle Main Road.  East leads back to the main
road, while west takes you into an Underground tunnel.
114.name: Main Moogle Road

description: Smurfy Road
Smurfy Road
As you enter this small home you see numerous little moogles running in
circles chasing each other with toy weapons while chirping loudly.  This
place is a mess.  The kids really did a number in here.
124.name: Moogle House

description: The {cs{Ct{Wr{We{Ca{cm{x trickles off to the southwest.  A small water {yc{*r{ge{ra{rt{gu{*r{ye{x
hops up from the {cw{Ca{Wt{Ce{cr{x and sends a splash of {Cc{Wo{Co{Wl{x relaxing {Cl{Wi{Bqu{Wi{Cd{x into
your face.  The {cw{Ca{Wt{Ce{cr{x seems to be {Yl{Ra{Yu{Rg{Yh{Ri{Yn{Rg{x at you as it continues on
it's {%w{^a{%y{x.
143.name: Fields of the Cherry Blossoms

description: You have come to a crossroads at the center of Moogletown.  Unfortunately
for you, the music is at its {@LOUDEST{0 here.  Alas though, the music comes
from no direct source.  It swells around you.
106.name: Main Moogle Road

description: Smurfy Road
Smurfy Home
Smurfy Road
Smurfy Road
Your sense of smell is immediately overwhelmed as you enter this small
grove of {1cherry{0 trees.  A relaxing, and magical feeling overcomes you as
you take a few steps in.  The {1cherry{0 trees are at the peak of their
blossuming stage and {7soft {%pink{0 flowers adorn the branches of them all.
137.name: Cherry Blossom Viewing Area

description: This path is made of crushed granite that was most likely once a solid
slab of it.  Wonder what happened here...  The path continues north to a
cave entrance or south to the eastern road.
101.name: Dimly Lit Path

description: The path continues toward the village.
The path heads back toward the eastern road.
A long wooden bridge is here that crosses over a large body of calm
water.  A few song birds happily pass by and under the bridge post likely to
their nest.  To the west you can see a small settlement.
138.name: Bridge

description: An average-sized humanoid would be way too big to be using this
underground road.  But who cares?  Certainly not these little moogles.  The
music is growing intense as it BLARES through the village.  Your ears are
starting to ring.  The Underground Road continues to the north, west and
east.
105.name: Main Moogle Road

description: Smurfy Road
Smurfy Road
Smurfy Road
Entrance to smurf village
You look around this room and gasp in awe.  All around you there
are weapons of mundane and exotic nature.  Tapestries depicting
horrific battles adorn the walls.  Ancient books on strategy and
warcraft rest on the shelves.  In the center of the room you see a
throne made of the bones of Heros fallen in honorable battle.  You are
in the sanctum of Tempus Foehammer God of War!
150.name: Throne room of Tempus

description: The air is sprinkled with the scent of {6sw{5eetne{6ss{x as you travel
the cobblestone path through a park.  The path runs north and south, and the
way is almost hidden by the multitudes of cherry tree branches that beckon
for you to rest underneath them.  Looking around, you smile and see that the
only difficulty lies in choosing which blossoms to lay peacefully in...  To
the east or the west, young traveler?  Or if not too weary, venture on to
the {#s{3pe{6c{7tac{6u{3la{#r{x viewing area to the south.
140.name: Path Through the Cherry Park

description: You are on the Underground road and the music just hasn't quit.  The
tunes surround you everywhere and your ears are ringing.  A doorway is to
the west, while south and east lead out the main road.
112.name: Underground Road

description: Smurfy Road
Smurfy Home
Smurfy Road
It's the home of the leader of the smurfs.  Papa Smurf has a nicely
decorated home.  He takes pride in his work.  You could get to know him or
just squash him.  If Papa Smurf is not here he is probably at Smurfette's
putting the moves on her.  Another door lies to the west from here.
125.name: Papa Smurf's Home

description: Another grove of trees bearing {7K{3u{7po {3nuts{0 grow here.  The sweet
taste of the nuts is driving your taste buds crazy.  It almost, ALMOST,
makes you forget about all the slam dancing going on.  The main road is to
the west, while {7K{3u{7po {3nut{0 groves are to the north and south.
117.name: Kupo Nut Grove

description: Smurfberry Patch
Smurfy Road
Smurfberry Patch
A wonderous {cw{Ca{Wt{Ce{cr{Cf{Wa{Cl{cl{x {Bc{Ca{Ws{Cc{Ba{Cd{We{Bs{x down to a deep {Cp{*o{Co{*l{x.  The {Cp{*o{Co{*l{x flows
off to the west forming a mid sized {cs{Ct{Wre{Ca{cm{x.  On a {yb{rr{ya{rn{yc{rh{x of a near by
{rcherry{x tree you see the {Cr{co{yb{ce{Cs{x of some bathing {Yw{*o{gm{*a{Yn{x.  You sense she
still may be hiding around here somewhere.
145.name: Fields of the Cherry Blossoms

description: Ok, now this is something you've never seen before.  A whole building
devoted to closets...?!?  Closets line all four walls here and a big {1red
{3rug{0 covers the hard stone floor underneath.
120.name: Closet Hall

description: Smurfy Road
You have entered the Moogle Dance Studio, where all the little moogles
learn to dance those ground-shaking dances!  A Moogle Dance instructor does
a jig around the room while pointing out to little moogles about posture and
'keeping the beat'.  Perhaps he could you a thing or two too.
121.name: Dance Studio

description: Smurfy Road
You are travelling directly down the Main Road in Moogle Town.  To the
east you can see a tree grove of some sort that is outside.  To the west is
a side road and north and south continue the main road.
108.name: Main Moogle Road

description: Smurfy Road
Smurfberry patch
A stone path
Smurfy Road
The Moogle main road continues north and south here.  To the east you can
see a tree grove of some sort that is outside.  Of course, the music is
{#BLARING{0 through your head.  Sheesh, how much can these moogles take?
107.name: Main Moogle Road

description: Smurfy Road
Smurfberry Patch
Smurfy Road
This is the only alleyway in Moogle Town.  Even nice little quaint towns
have a place where it's messy.  Actually, now that you stand and listen, this
is the only place in town where the music isn't heard...  It's actually...
Peaceful.
113.name: Side Road

description: Smurfy Road
Smurfy House
YOWZA!  This place is hoppin' and so are you!  Why?  Because the ground
is shaking beneath you from all the dancing going on in here!  Hundreds of
Moogles clutter the club here...  And they are all dancing.  And as you
would guess it, the music is {#BLARING{0!!
122.name: Moogle Dance Club

description: Smurfy Road
You have come to a corner on the Underground road.  A rockslide has
blocked the passage to the east and west here.  A doorway is to the north,
leading into a moogle's home.  The main road is back west.
110.name: Underground Road

description: Smurfy Home
Smurfy Road
Here a deep {cs{Ct{Wr{We{Ca{cm{x flows in from the east and continues on to the
west.  A small arching {*s{gt{yo{gn{*e {*b{gr{yi{yd{gg{*e{x allows you passage over the
{cs{Ct{Wre{Ca{cm{x.  On the other side the ground is covered in the {%b{Wl{%o{Ws{%s{Wo{%m{Ws{x from
the surrounding {rcherry{x trees.  The {%f{Ci{We{Cl{%d{x of {%b{Wl{%o{Ws{%s{Wo{%m{Ws{x comes to a sudden
halt to the south as if by some {Bm{ya{Bg{yi{Bc{ya{Bl{x force.
144.name: End of the Cherry Park Path

description: {^This room shines with a nearly blinding light.  There are sex toys
lying everywhere, and you don't see any walls.  {^The only thing in the room
besides you, the toys and a huge bed is an odd apparatus in the corner that
could be {^used for several things, including torture!  His large bed is
crafted of the most beautiful materials, and it is {^inlaid with {!
J{@e{#w{Be{%l{&s{^.  In the middle of the bed there are beautiful
unstraightend {!  Red {&satin sheets{^.  {^The room is quite erotic in
decor, and the constant breeze blowing through it is very stimulating
indeed.  As you {^look around and take in the sights you begin to
wonder.....  {x
148.name: Deneir's {!B{@e{#d{*r{%o{^o{Bm{x

description: The northernmost of the {7K{3u{7po {3nut{0 trees grows here.  It looks as
scrumptious as all the rest.  Just take a few; they'll never know.  The main
road is to the west and the {7K{3u{7po {3nut {@grove{0 is the south.
118.name: Kupo Nut Grove

description: Smurfy Road
Smurfberry Patch
This house is conveniently next to Papa Smurfs.  Makes it easier for Papa
Smurf to sneak over at night.  I hope he uses protection.  I would hate to
have little smurfs running around.  The only exit is to the east.
129.name: Smurfette's House

description: You have hit the end of the alley here and the only exits are back east
or into a small cubby hole to the west.  Hmmm.  But that moogle standing
there doesn't seem to want to let you in.
123.name: Dead End

description: Smurfy Road
You have come to a corner on the Underground road.  A cave-in has blocked
the passage to the west here.  A doorway is to the south, leading into a
moogle's home.  To the north, the road continues, and back east is to the
main road.
111.name: Underground Road

description: Smurfy Road
Smurfy Road
Smurfy Home
To the north {rcherry{x trees stand side by side blocking your {yp{*a{yt{*h{x.
Their {%pink{x and {Wwhite{x {%b{Wl{%o{Ws{%s{Wo{%m{Ws{x giving forth a {Cs{%w{We{%e{Ct{x scent drawing you
twards them...  You feel a slight {Cb{Br{ce{ce{Bz{Ce{x coming from the north.  An
unfinished {rp{ba{yi{*n{*t{yi{bn{rg{x of what seems like some wonderous {Wm{Ba{Wg{Bi{Wc{Ba{Wl{x place
lies on the ground here.  {rP{ya{gi{yn{rt{x and {yb{*r{yu{*s{yh{*e{ys{x are scattered on the
ground around it.
146.name: Fields of the Cherry Blossoms

description: A small well is here.  Just the right size if you're a smurf.  But big
enough for you to get some water from.  I'm sure the smurfs wont mind.
A {7s{8t{7o{8n{7e{0 well lies here in the middle of the underground road.
A barricade to the north blocks intrusions from anything that might cause
the mogs harm.  To the east is a small opening leading outside to a grove of
some sort.  The Main road continues to the south and west.
109.name: Main Moogle Road

description: Smurfberry Patch
Smurfy Road
Smurfy Road

A cute little white moogle with floppy ears and a red nose seems to be
having a blast.
101.room_name: A moogle is dancing and chirping along.
101.name: {0A moogle~

description:
A moogle is quietly, but quickly picking nuts.  He seems to hardly notice
you as he greedily picks them one by one.
102.room_name: A moogle is here, picking nuts.
102.name: a moogle~

description:
A lab moogle is here holding potions up to the light and peering at them
intently.  Hmm..  Wonder what he's planning..  World domination?  Nah...
103.room_name: A curious moogle is here experimenting with potions...uh oh..
103.name: a lab moogle~

description:
What a healthy moogle!  This guy..  Er gal..  Umm, can you tell if
moogles are guys or gals anyhow?  Well anyway, IT is really fit and
muscular.  It does a jig around the room, shouting out orders to the little
ones.
104.room_name: The Moogle Dance Instructor is here, teaching fitness and dance techniques.
104.name: The Dance Instructor~

105.room_name: A moogle is here, doing a ground shaking dance!
105.name: a dancing moogle~

description:
Hefty is a total health nut.  He lifts weights, eats right, and exercises all
the time.  Won't do him much good when he's DEAD.
106.room_name: Hefty Smurf is lifting weights here.
106.name: Hefty Smurf~

description: This moogle seems intent on keeping you out of his cubby hole!
107.room_name: A moogle is here, making sure no one gets into his cubby hole!
107.name: a personal moogle~

description: Eeeeek! This moogle is pointing a gun right at you! I hope it's a toy!
108.room_name: A playful moogle is here, pointing a gun right at you!
108.name: a playful moogle~

description:
Smurfette is the cutest little smurf you've ever seen.  If only she were your
size.  I wonder how much she charges the other smurfs.
109.name: Smurfette~

description:
Yep, its Papa Smurf all right.  Red hat and boots and the funny little white
beard.  Papa Smurf treats his fellow smurfs with dignity and respect.  That
is why Papa Smurf is so popular among the ladies.
110.room_name: Papa Smurf is practicing magic here.
110.name: Papa Smurf~

description:
Gargamel has never done anything right in his life.  He has caught smurfs
before but always lets them escape.  He brings true meaning to the word moron.
111.room_name: Gargamel is here, cursing out the smurfs.
111.name: Gargamel~

description:
Gargamel's worthless cat.  He is just about as dumb as Gargamel.  He should
just grab a smurf in his teeth and chew away.
112.name: Azreal~

description:
What the heck is this thing.....  It looks like a big white
marshmallow...  But kinda like a housepet; a dog or cat.  What a weird
animal..  It bounces around happily, swaying its hips to the music around
it.
113.room_name: A cheerful moogle is here dancing wildy.
113.name: a cheerful moogle~

114.room_name: A baby moogle is here, trying very hard to 'rock the house'.
114.name: a baby moogle~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

115.name: Kaori~
subroutines:
M grall 115 100~
M speech 116 greentea~
M speech 117 song~
M random 118 5~

116.name: a horse~
subroutines:
F for MV
F par I

117.room_name: A petite girl who has a katana at her side, is ready to sell you a mount.
117.name: A petite girl~
subroutines:
F for H
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

118.name: A doom dragon~
subroutines:
F for H
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

119.name: An Ancient Golden Dragon~
119.t_flags: T Hello, welcome to the Gardens of Deneir. You may wander around, but leave the flowers as you found them, and we will not have any troubles.~

136.d_flags: D I just wanted a bloody bath!~
description:
Kaliana sits very still here trying to blend in with her surroundings hoping you wont nitice her
Shes as naked as the day is long and very uncomfortable that you keep staring.....
136.room_name: A dark haired woman sits here fresh out of the {cw{Ca{Wte{*r{Wfa{Cl{cl{x!
136.name: {CK{ca{yl{*i{ya{cn{Ca{x~
136.keywords: Kaliana bathing woman girl naked beauty~
136.t_flags: T Please dont hurt me, i just want to bathe!~

description: A small japanese girl lies against the trunk of a {rcherry{C tree.{x
135.room_name: A small japanese girl lies against the trunk of a {rcherry{x tree.
135.name: {rM{ge{ry{go{rk{go{x~
